resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this stop?
No saved bus stops, click the + to add one
May be used to send you bus arrival times or other announcements.
BusChecker works by querying transport companies\' SMS services. To do this, it needs the SMS permissions.

BusChecker uses SMS (text messages) to get the bus arrival times. These SMS count against your mobile plan. 
DON'T USE THE APP IF YOU DON'T HAVE AN UNLIMITED SMS PLAN. 

I am not responsible if you continue to use the app and you use all of your available SMS. Continue only if you're sure that your SMS plan is unlimited.
You will see a popup saying that BusChecker sending a SMS to 52736 will cause charges. It won\'t be the case; click on \"Remember my choice\" and on \"Akways Allow\".
You must grant SMS permission to BusChecker to continue.
